listEmpty: Press the lower right button to add some stations.

like.submitMessage: Your like has been submitted to the Community Radio Browser.

unableToVote.title: Failed to vote
unableToVote.description: Unable to vote for the station. Error message received: “{0}”

error.goOnline: Please make sure that you are online.

fileNotSupported.title: File not supported
fileNotSupported.description: The selected file was not created with this version of {0} or is corrupted.

networkIssue.title: Network error
networkIssue.description:
Sorry, there seems to be a network issue a the moment.
{0}

hlsNotSupported.title: HLS not supported
hlsNotSupported.description: Sorry, the HLS protocol is required to play {0}, which your browser does not seem to support.

decode.title: Decode error
decode.description: Sorry, the stream could not be decoded and is apparently not supported.

noSupportedSource.title: No supported source
noSupportedSource.description: Sorry, the stream is either not supported, is currently unavailable, or has been blocked.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Sorry, your network connection seems to be too slow at the moment. @:general.tryAgainLater

hlsGeneric.title: Failed to play
hlsGeneric.description: Sorry, {0} cannot be played due to a {1}.

undoableEvent.list: A list called “{0}” has been removed.

about.licenseInfo: {0} is {1}: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
about.noWarranty: {0} is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU Affero General Public License for more details.
about.licenseCopy: You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License along with {0}. If not, see {1} for more details.

dropZone.usage: Use drag & drop to add a file, or click here to add it manually…

multipleFilesError.title: Multiple files selected
multipleFilesError.description: Please select only one file per process.

editor.title: Station editor
editor.notExisting: The station to be edited does not exist.

H.name: @:general.hotkeys
H.description: Show or hide this hotkey overview.

M.name: @:general.menu
M.description: Open up a dialog directly from the main menu.

.name: @:player.playStop
.description: Start or stop playing the most recently selected station.

F.name: @:player.toggleFullscreen
F.description: Enter or exit fullscreen mode during video streams.

Esc.name: Close current view
Esc.description: Close the current dialog. In addition, Escape usually exits fullscreen mode.

P.name: @:player.prevStation
P.description: Switch to the previous station in the current list.

N.name: @:player.nextStation
N.description: Switch to the next station in the current list.

0-9.name: Station selection
0-9.description: Switch to another station depending on its position in the current list.

importWizard.description: Here you may import backups of your {0}.

emptyName.title: Empty name
emptyName.description: Please enter a name for the list under “Step 2”.

nameTaken.title: Name already taken
nameTaken.description: A list with this name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?

listManager.description: Use this tool to manage your station lists.
listManager.nameEmpty: The name needs to consist of at least one character.

credit.radioBrowser: The search feature is powered by the {0} {1}.

search.optionsUnavailable: Oh no! Some options are currently unavailable due to connectivity issues.

bitrate.label: Bitrate
bitrate.description: Only include stations with a certain bitrate (kbit/s) in the results.

settings.description: Here you may customize {0} to your needs.

externalPlayback.name: @:general.externalPlayback
externalPlayback.description: When changing stations, download a playlist for opening in another app.

compactMode.name: Compact mode
compactMode.description: Reduce the display size of station entries.

colorChange.name: Color change
colorChange.description: Automatically pick an accent and background color depending on which stream is currently running.

visualization.name: Pseudo-visualization
visualization.description: Display an audio visualization based on random values during an ongoing audio stream.
visualization.screenWidthIssue: Screen or window not wide enough

relaxMode.name: Relax mode
relaxMode.description: For audio streams, only show station info and visualization on a colored background. Fired during user inactivity.

sleep.name: @:sleepTimer.name
sleep.description: Stops the current stream automatically after a certain number of minutes.
